Translations.Text: Recite por them histori Noah. Li dir al his popol O my popol vi trov my pozici my reminding vi de di revelations tro mult vi tiam mi put my fid DI! Vi get together your estr agree sur final decision yourselves tiam let me kon gxi sen delay
Vi turn tiam mi ne pet vi any wage My wage ven el DI. Mi komand est submitter
Ili rejected him consequently ni sav him those joined him ark; ni far them inheritors. Ni dron those rejected our revelations. Not consequences; ili avert
Tiam ni send him messengers their popol ili montr them klar proofs Ili ne est kred en ki ili rejected en des preter. Ni tiel sigel kor transgressors
Tiam ni send them Moses Aaron Pharaoh his grup our proofs Sed ili torn arrogant; transgressing popol
When truth ven them us ili dir This est obviously magic
Moses dir this kiel vi describe truth when gxi Est ven vi? est this magic Kiel any magicians prevail
Ili dir vi ven divert us el ki ni trov our parents doing ating pozici de prominence yourselves? Ni neniam join vi as believers
Pharaoh dir Bring me cxiu spert magician
When magicians ven Moses dir al them Jxet whatever vi jxet
When ili jxet Moses dir Ki vi produkt est magic DI testament far gxi fail DI NE support transgressors' work
DI ESTABL truth His VORT criminals
